title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in win32 uses Class.forName() method.
EB: Add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class to prevent instantiation.
SR: To reproduce the bug: change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
